answers.answer: Also, Ive gained 6lbs in a week.

Wow, I can't believe your being treated like this and not taken seriously. How far along are you?  I know swelling, headaches, and blurry vision along with high blood pressure are all symptoms of pre eclampsia. When you go back you need to express how you've been feeling and in the mean time if you get any symptoms go to the er. Good luck

I think u need to ring ur labour dept and speak to a midwidfe.if ur bloodpressure was high and uve been getting headaches and swelling i think its a possible sign u have it.dont take any chance.better to be safe than sorry.

Im 30 weeks. I had a really bad kidney infection in January, and i now have Pyelonephritis, im not sure exactly what it is but i know it makes my right kidney not really put anything out. But that can cause preeclampsia. I cant get over how rude she was. I was going to call back and get an appointment with another doctor but i didnt know if im freaking out too much.

I dont want to panic u but u need to ring the labour dept now.look after urself.cant believe how incompetant that nurse was.i am 36 weeks.my feet and legs swelled up last nite.i said it to my midwife today, straight away she checked my urine,blood pressure and asked did i get any headaches.luckily all was normal so she just said its cos ive a big baby and lots of fluid.but if my blood pressure was ever high and i had headaches to come straight in. U cant leave this be. Best of luck an let me know how u get on.

Did they check your urine for protein? I had preeclampsia with my first and I had the same symptoms as you and they checked my urine and it had protein. I would definitely look into the other midwife you saw or a Dr because preeclampsia is serious for both you and baby if not monitored and controlled. I don't mean to frighten you but it is a lot of symptoms and you are not over reacting
Good luck and keep us posted
i didnt have any protien in my urine, which is why i think she was just ignoring me. Is it possible for you to have preeclampsia without protien in your urine?
i didnt have any protien in my urine, which is why i think she was just ignoring me. Is it possible for you to have preeclampsia without protien in your urine?
Without protein its considered pregnancy induced hypertension...high blood pressure due to pregnancy

question: Ive been having some swelling for about two weeks. Ive been telling my doctors but they said its normal. My blood pressure is usually around 110/60. Ive kept a headache but towards 3ish when i start to swell really bad i get a headache so bad it feels like my head is swelling and i get so dizzy i have to lay down. Today I had an appointment with a different midwife then i usually see. My blood pressure was 130/90, the nurse said that was high. I told the midwife how ive been swelling and always have a headache and that my blood pressure was high. She was pretty rude and said that it was normal, only time to be worried is when i have a headache, i tried to explain to her i keep a really bad headache but she just said come back and two weeks and left. Anyone know what the signs are for preeclampsia or what to do?
title: Swelling
